headline: SLB price target lowered to $50 from $53 at Citi
summary: Citi lowered the firm’s price target on SLB (SLB) to $50 from $53 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The slowdown in upstream capex appears to be intensifying on the margin and Citi reduced forecasted earnings for SLB as a result, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm reset expectations for SLB’s 2025. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
